name: Humanitarian Crises Secretariat
legal: Autonomous Ecclesiastical Agency - Legal  entity of private Law
goal:
The Humanitarian Crisis Secretary is an NGO and the National Operations Center Against the Humanitarian Crisis, under the aegis of the Archbishop of Athens & All Greece Ieronymos .

The Humanitarian Crisis Secretary plans, coordinates, and finances social policies & actions based on the real needs and priorities, which will arise through continuous consultation and cooperation with all entities providing social work (Sacred, urban areas, municipalities, regions, public institutions, non-governmental organizations), and implemented throughout it.

The Humanitarian Crisis Secretariat currently administrate ecclesiastical activities to combat efficiently and transparent the humanitarian crisis in Greece.

The ecclesiastical actions, are based on a decentralized structure of the Church of Greece, as well as in the different Institutions (generally funds, local funds , institutions providing social work etc.). This structure offers access to all remote locations,

The Humanitarian Crisis Secretariat address the problems that the humanitarian crisis and the refuges crises witch effects all the country.

The Humanitarian Crisis Secretariat is the relevant organisation for comprehensive planning and optimal use of all available resources.

This Humanitarian Crisis Secretariat is based in Athens and works under the supervision of Archbishop of Athens & All Greece with following purpose:

? The strategic planning of actions against the humanitarian crisis.
? The consultation of planning with all the actors in the field of social policy (municipalities, regions, Sacred urban areas, public institutions etc. )
? The management and allocation of all available resources for the specialization of actions resulting from the consultation.
? The assessment of actions that will occur.
interests: Culture, Education, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Youth
